product_name: GSI Outdoors Collapsible JavaDrip Slim Drip Coffee Maker
long_description: Get your morning started right with the GSI Collapsible JavaDrip(TM) Slim Drip coffee maker. Collapsible drip cone holds a #4 coffee filter (not included) and lets you brew 1 - 12 cups of coffee. Silicone bellows allow the drip cone to collapse into a disc measuring 5.6 in. in diameter by 1 in. thick. Flange on bottom helps center the drip cone over mugs, cups and wide-mouth bottles. Transparent base lets you see into your mug to prevent overfilling. Lid doubles as a trivet when you're done brewing. Please note: coffee maker is not designed for use with container openings smaller than 2.5 in. in diameter.
short_description: Get your morning started right with the GSI Collapsible JavaDrip(TM) Slim Drip coffee maker.
